issue.title: [CF 1350] Timer comparisons
issue.body:
Idea:

Icon tracks bigwigs timer and is displayed based on duration of that timer. I.e.

If (Boss = X ) and ( timerY < 10 seconds) then show.

 

Since last tmw update some of those timer act strange on specific bosses. I.e. on any Trial of Valor bosses they appear at the pull and then never again. I haven't tried this: If ( timerY < 10 seconds) then show. But I don't like that without a boss/instance check.
